Class InstructionNoArgs

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InstructionADD, InstructionCMP, InstructionDEC, InstructionDIV, InstructionGETCH, InstructionGETINT, InstructionHALT, InstructionINC, InstructionLDCB0, InstructionLDCB1, InstructionLDCINT0, InstructionLDCINT1, InstructionLOAD2B, InstructionLOADB, InstructionLOADW, InstructionMOD, InstructionMUL, InstructionNEG, InstructionNOT, InstructionPUTBYTE, InstructionPUTCH, InstructionPUTEOL, InstructionPUTINT, InstructionPUTSTR, InstructionSTORE2B, InstructionSTOREB, InstructionSTOREW, InstructionSUB
    public abstract class InstructionNoArgs
extends Instruction
    This class serves as a base class for the abstract syntax tree for an assembly language instruction with no arguments.
